cpl.name: Sitemap for server
cpl.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-server-sitemap
cpl.description:
Generate Sitemap for your Nodejs based server.

Use this with your NodeJS based wiki server, or your [[blog served with TidGi|https://tidgi.fun/#TidGi%20Feature%20Handbook%2FBlogging%20With%20NAT%20Traversal]].
cpl.readme:
Generate Contents Links Like:

Sitemap: https://tidgi.fun/sitemap.xml

Robots: https://tidgi.fun/robots.txt
